message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be a great fit for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing it, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective on the value, but I'm confident this product is worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $16,000. Would you be willing to meet me there?
